events.message: I want to report a car accident that occurred yesterday at the intersection. My vehicle was hit from behind while I was stopped at a red light.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your claim to assist with the next steps and to guide you through the process.
Your claim has been acknowledged and is now officially recorded in our system for further assessment.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, a police report, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including photos of the damage and the police report have been submitted successfully.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the evidence and statements related to your vehicle collision.
The investigation is complete, and all facts have been verified according to the documentation and witness statements.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on repair estimates and coverage terms of your insurance policy.
You provided feedback expressing your appreciation for the transparency in the settlement process but requested a faster timeline.
Your claim has been approved in full for the proposed settlement amount to cover damages to your vehicle.
The payment for the approved settlement has been issued to your bank account as per your instructions.
Your claim is now officially closed as all payments have been processed and no further action is required.
